This is a blog documenting my learning process of Finance. We will be sharing my notes and thoughts on various topics in Finance. Hope you will find them helpful.

docs.title: NLP-Tokenizer
docs.text: This blog is about the tokenizer in NLP. The tokenizer is the first step in NLP. It is the process of converting a sequence of characters into a sequence of tokens.
